Package controlPanel

Class BillboardControl

java.lang.Object
controlPanel.BillboardControl
public class BillboardControl
extends java.lang.Object
The BillboardControl contains on the communication methods between the Control Panel to the server for Billboard Methods. It includes methods which will use functions from helpers that initialises communication and returns relevant object from server or server acknowledgements, such as creating, editing, removing Billboards.

  • Method Details

    • createBillboardRequest

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge createBillboardRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String billboardName, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String XMLCode, byte[] pictureData) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Send Queries: Billboard. This is a generic method which sends a create billboard request from control panel to server.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is used to check if the user are allowed to be interacting with the app. Generated when the user first logins
      billboardName - A String which provides Billboard Name to store into database
      creator - A string which notes the user who created the billbaord
      XMLCode - A String which provides xmlCode to store into database
      pictureData - A Byte array which is base64 encoded represenation of the actual picture
      Returns:
      ServerAcknowledge A enum which indicates pass/fail status which is used to assist in the GUI actions.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.

    • deleteBillboardRequest

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge deleteBillboardRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String billboardName, java.lang.String requestor) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Send Queries: Billboard. This is a generic method which sends a request to Delete a billboard from control panel to server.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is used to check if the user are allowed to be interacting with the app. Generated when the user first logins
      billboardName - A String which provides Billboard Name to delete from database
      requestor - A string which provides the username whom wants to delete data from the database
      Returns:
      ServerAcknowledge A enum which indicates pass/fail status which is used to assist in the GUI actions.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.

    • listBillboardRequest

      public static java.lang.Object listBillboardRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Send Queries: Billboard. This is a generic method which sends a request to List billboards from control panel to server.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is used to check if the user are allowed to be interacting with the app. Generated when the user first logins
      Returns:
      Returns an Object file via serialised from server which can be casted into BillboardList for a list of billboards
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.

    • getBillboardRequest

      public static java.lang.Object getBillboardRequest​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String billboardName) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Send Queries: Billboard. This is a generic method which sends a request to get a billboard information from control panel to server.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is used to check if the user are allowed to be interacting with the app. Generated when the user first logins
      billboardName - A String which provides Billboard Name to store into database
      Returns:
      Returns an object file from server via serialisation which can be cast into DbBillboard which contains all information about the quiried billboard.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws an exception when a specified class cannot be found in the classpath.
